speech: The highest package varies each year, but in recent years, students have secured offers up to ₹20 LPA from companies like Amazon, Google, and Microsoft.
he average salary package for placed students typically falls between ₹3.5 LPA to ₹6 LPA, depending on the branch and company.
The placement percentage at CBIT Engineering College varies each year but typically ranges between 80% to 90%. Many students receive multiple offers from top recruiters.
Some of the top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Cognizant, Accenture, Capgemini, Tech Mahindra, HCL, Amazon, and IBM, among others.
